column4: hello. recently, xubuntu (precise) complains that it cannot download http://de.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/precise-updates/universe/binary-amd64/Packages, so automatic updates fail. this file apparently does not exist, but a Packages.gz exists. Is there any solution to this?
update your sources.lst look for an active mirror for your version
the file does not exist in us.archive.ubuntu.com as well
you'll have to look for it
